overview: Live performance, part of Monteverdi cycle staged by Oper Zürich with Nikolaus Harnoncourt conducting the Zürich Opera House Monteverdi Ensemble. Staged and directed by Jean-Pierre Ponnelle
tagline: L'Incoronazione di Poppea (1979) Oper Zürich.  Monteverdi / Italian
title: L'Incoronazione di Poppea
